A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie was a terrible disappointment. I grew up watching movies 4\,5 & 6 on video because my father grew up when these movies were released so being a true Star Wars fan this was a disappointment. What it comes down to is there were way too many stupid and pointless scenes and actions in the movie. It’s plain and simple. There were too many things that were absolutely ridiculous. Honestly Disney don’t try to change Star Wars into what you want. Stay true to the original three movies and then expand but do not change what they created for they are what Star Wars truly is.
